title.rendered: Tattoo Art Awareness – Feel the Real Tattooing Experience at The Real Tattoo Studio

content.rendered:
Are you ready to make a statement?

Dive into the world of tattoo artistry with Black Poison Tattoos, where every stroke tells a story.

We’re excited to announce our latest offer: Get a 3 sq. in. tattoo for just 499 INR!

But this isn’t just about getting inked; it’s about embracing the art form and spreading awareness about the beauty of tattoos.

At Black Poison Tattoos, we’re not just a studio; we’re a hub of creativity and expression.

Our team of skilled artists is dedicated to bringing your vision to life with precision and passion. From intricate designs to bold statements, we do it all with finesse.

Hygiene is Our Priority

We understand the importance of safety, especially when it comes to something as personal as getting a tattoo. That’s why we adhere to strict hygiene standards, ensuring a clean and sterile environment for every client.

Custom Creations Just for You

Your tattoo should be as unique as you are. That’s why we work closely with each client to design a piece that reflects their personality and style. Whether you have a clear idea in mind or need some inspiration, our artists are here to bring your vision to life.

Quality Over Everything

While our offer may be a steal, we never compromise on quality. Each tattoo is executed with the utmost care and attention to detail, ensuring that you walk away with a piece of art that you’ll cherish for years to come.

Beware of Bad Designs and Wrong Practices

Unfortunately, not all tattoo studios prioritize the same level of quality and care. Some may offer cheap deals but deliver subpar designs or employ wrong practices during the tattooing process. This can result in bad outcomes, both in terms of the initial design and the final result after healing.

Say No to Unhygienic Tattoo Studios

Unhygienic tattoo studios pose a serious risk to your health. Improper sterilization of equipment and unsanitary working conditions can lead to infections and other complications. Don’t compromise your well-being for a cheap tattoo. Choose a studio like Black Poison Tattoos that prioritizes hygiene and safety above all else.

Join Us in Spreading Tattoo Awareness

By availing of our exclusive offer, you’re not just getting a tattoo; you’re supporting the promotion of tattoo artistry as a form of self-expression.

Come visit us and see for yourself why Black Poison Tattoos is the premier destination for ink enthusiasts in Ahmedabad.

Don’t miss out on this limited-time offer!

Book your appointment today and let’s create something truly extraordinary together.

Discover the artistry of real tattoos. Discover Black Poison Tattoos – The Real Tattoo Studio.

Aspect Good Tattoo Studio Bad Tattoo Studio
Choosing a Studio Reputation for professionalism, cleanliness, skilled artists Lack of professionalism, cleanliness, unskilled artists
Hygiene Standards Strict sanitation protocols followed Lack of hygiene standards, dirty environment
Artist Skill & Experience Experienced, skilled artists Inexperienced artists, lack of skill
Ink Quality High-quality ink for vibrant, long-lasting tattoos Subpar ink quality, risk of fading or allergic reactions
Consultation & Communication Clear communication, thorough consultations Poor communication, misunderstandings
Portfolio & Reviews Diverse portfolio, positive reviews Lack of portfolio, negative reviews
Cleanliness & Sterilization Sterile equipment, clean environment Dirty environment, lack of sterilization
Aftercare Guidance Clear aftercare instructions provided Inadequate aftercare guidance
Legal Compliance Adheres to legal regulations, licensing Operates illegally, disregards legal requirements
Investment in Your Body Values safety, artistry, satisfaction Neglects safety, prioritizes profit over customer well-being

Highlights

  • Valid for Monday to Friday
  • Valid only for 3 Square inches
  • Only Pay 499 INR (We are not charging any Artist Service charge in this Tattoo Art Awareness Campaign)
  • You must show the Voucher Code from your Email before getting services.
  • The voucher will not be valid if you show it after getting services.

T&C

  1. Prior appointment is required
  2. Limited Slots Everyday
  3. One voucher is valid for one person, one tattoo & on a single visit
  4. Not valid for cashback
  5. This gift voucher cannot be clubbed/redeemed with any other promotional offer at Black Poison Tattoos
  6. Black Poison Tattoos reserves all rights to amend rules
  7. Not valid on Festivals Days, Public Holidays & Weekends
  8. Rates differ as per the customization and the artists
  9. Rates depend on Tattoo Design, Artist, Size, Timing, and body Placement.
  10. No verbal commitments are accepted in case of dispute, outlet management’s decision will be final.
  11. For further inquiry on offers visit our outlet or call us.
  12. Offer valid on selected studio locations only.
  13. Select your design from our selected portfolio.
  14. Valid on only basic designs and not valid on complicated & coloured designs. Customized Designs are not included in this offer rate.
  15. There is no additional cost for a 1 square inch tattoo other than the Setup cost
  16. A standard rate of 700 INR per square inch is applicable above 3 sq. in. Tattoos
  17. The actual cost of this 3 sq. in. tattoo is 2900 INR + GST
